alert.note: Alert for Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Marengo County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sweet Water, or 13 miles south of Linden, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sweet Water, Myrtlewood, Putnam, Wayne, Miller, Nanafalia, Dixons Mill, Calvary, Half Acre, Clayhill and Nicholsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama.
